summary:
Contains the following:
- Sword geometry (OBJ, FBX)
- Sword textures (TGAs)
descriptionHtml:
======== UPDATE ==========

The original zip file did not contain the texture flats (human error!). Correct zip file has been uploaded.

==========================

This was started after the request was made in this thread:

http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/937167-zahkrii-do-dovahkiin-hidden-dlc-dragonborn-sword/

However, life is busy and am unable to finish. The model and textures are complete, they just need to be hooked up in-game with proper shouts and FX.
author: Twizzler77
